::Havoc/Repressor::

Havoc slowly sat up, looking around him at the CR room of the Iron 
Fist. He threw his legs over the side of the tank that he had been at 
and stood up.

"Warmachines," he said into his comm to all the Warmachines 
(Demolition, Chaos, Minion, and Repressor), "Report to Training Room 
1 of the Iron Fist. We got some work to do."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Repressor sat up from another CR chamber and rolled over the edje, 
falling to the ground with a clang. He was woozy but repaired. He got 
up and followed Havoc toward the training room.
